ygData.subject: RE: Re[2]:Experience and Twinking
ygData.msgSnippet: It s all good.  Plus it s just hilarious to see what passes as logical reasoning in some of these posts.  A sure sign of the demise of education in this
ygData.messageBody:
It's all good. Plus it's just hilarious to see what passes as ''logical
reasoning'' in some of these posts. A sure sign of the demise of
education in this country. People combine half thoughts with ''logical''
leaps of faith and plain falsehoods to support an argument. I always
get a good laugh out of reading these and picking them apart point
by point.

>first place.... but fun while it lasts...
>
>Merilyn, Sister of the Ashen Order on Xegony
